item.description:
Alright guys, lets get our beer on. Soren has offered to host the event. I will grab a bunch of beers of different flavors and we can taste test them. Everyone please bring $10. The amount of beerage we can get will depend upon RSVPs we have. Hopefully we can get a good crowd together so we will have lots of tasting material.

This will be hosted at Soren's house. The address will be sent out on Saturday morning after RSVPs close. ( I will need time to buy the beer so I have to set a cut off time)

If you are interested in hanging out but are not a beer drinker please note that in your RSVP.

See you all on Saturday!
item.name: Beer Fest
